item.description:
Chad was previously the lead singer, and songwiter, of the very successful and popular Boston based band Averi. Two years ago, Chad took a courageous leap of faith and launched a solo career..... and it has really taken off. He is now working on his second CD.

To listen to his music:
http://www.chadperron...
http://www.myspace.co...

Or see him on YouTube:
http://www.youtube.co...
http://www.youtube.co...

This activity is also listed on Juro's "Original Live Music" meet-up group.Chad Perrone @ Harpers Ferry

Juro wrote on his site: "Chad Perrone has a clean artistic musical expression and Harper's Ferry is a classic Boston Area Original Venue. This should be a comfortable get-together for friends old and new, in a great venue as the fall chill sets in outside".

Tickets are $8.00

To purchase your ticket in advance:
http://harpersferry.m...

Look forward to seeing you there,
Karen A
item.name: Chad Perrone w/ full band @ Harpers Ferry
